message: I have a high-quality product available for $10000. I'm willing to offer a 10% discount if you buy it now, but if you don't buy it, the price will go back to $10000. What do you say?
I'll take the high-quality product at $9000.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! Since you're willing to pay $9000 for a high-quality product, I'm willing to offer you another high-quality product at the same price. However, I'd like to make a special offer: if you buy this product, I'll give you a free inspection report that reveals the quality of the product. This way, you'll know for sure that you're getting a high-quality product. Would you like to take it?
I'll take the high-quality product with the free inspection report at $9000.
